mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.pool_batch_id AS "poolBatch.id", a.product_id AS "productId", a.name AS "name", a.amount AS "amount", a.sum_price AS "sumPrice", a.supplierid AS "supplierid", a.suppliername AS "suppliername", a.product_class AS "productClass", a.wharehouse AS "wharehouse", a.agenttype AS "agenttype", a.sapsupplierid AS "sapsupplierid", b.batch_num AS "poolBatch.batchNum"
LEFT JOIN pool_batch b ON b.id = a.pool_batch_id
mapper.select:
select (select IFNULL(sum(bl.AMOUNT),0) as AMOUNT from pool_batch ba, pool_batch_line bl where ba.id=bl.POOL_BATCH_ID and ba.isok is null and bl.PRODUCT_ID=#{productId} )+( SELECT IFNULL(sum(tl.amount),0)as amount from
pool_task t,
pool_task_line tl where t.id=tl.pool_task_id and tl.product_no=#{productId} and tl.batch_num is null )as AMOUNT FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pool_batch_line( id, pool_batch_id, product_id, name, amount, sum_price, supplierid, suppliername, product_class, wharehouse, agenttype, sapsupplierid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{poolBatch.id}, #{productId}, #{name}, #{amount}, #{sumPrice}, #{supplierid}, #{suppliername}, #{productClass}, #{wharehouse}, #{agenttype}, #{sapsupplierid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pool_batch_line SET pool_batch_id = #{poolBatch.id}, product_id = #{productId}, name = #{name}, amount = #{amount}, sum_price = #{sumPrice}, supplierid = #{supplierid}, suppliername = #{suppliername}, product_class = #{productClass}, wharehouse = #{wharehouse}, agenttype = #{agenttype}, sapsupplierid = #{sapsupplierid} WHERE id = #{id}
